title: iTunes for Windows updated to version 12.12.4 with security fixes
content:
Apple this week quietly released an update for the Windows version of its iTunes music player. However, rather than adding new features, the update is focused on fixing bugs and security breaches for those who still rely on iTunes.

more…

The post iTunes for Windows updated to version 12.12.4 with security fixes appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple this week quietly released an update for the Windows version of its iTunes music player. However, rather than adding new features, the update is focused on fixing bugs and security breaches for those who still rely on iTunes.
